name: Village Hero(Beta).
description:
Synopsis:

In a particular village, there is peace and prosperity and a hero.

Everyone calls him Farmer, as he is the only Farmer in the village.

He has a good reputation as he helps all the people in the village, calling him a hero.

But one day, a mysterious group attacks the village, so everyone counts on the Farmer...

From a village hero, it seems that he has to become a real hero!

..

The game contains an adventure with a beginning, middle and end with three missions to venture into the village.

This game is a beta version, and we don't know when we will continue it...

There are some bugs in it. Many of them are not severe, but there are two that you need to be notified of:
  • Sword Bug, the sword doesn't appear when you use the blade. The solution is to click the sword button again.
  • Boss stage: unfortunately, the creators don't have time to continue with Village Hero, and there is a damn bug that you may not be able to fight the boss(when you enter the ... {SPOILERS} ).

..

I hope that you will enjoy this Beta version.
